error_description: Try again. If the error is not resolved please report it.
home_section1_title: Don't let the stars be Your guide
home_section1_subtitle: start using Blue Marble for the pixel perfect precision
home_section2_item1_description: Blue Marble displays the template directly onto the canvas, no additional lineups are required.
home_section2_item2_description: Tracking the number of correctly and incorrectly placed pixels at real-time.
home_section2_item3_description:
The entire Blue Marble (even this website!) codebase is open sourced and available for anyone to contribute.

This ensures security and high performance.
home_section2_item4_description: Because Blue Marble is used concurrently by 20,000+ users, collaborating on pixel projects is as easy as it can get.
home_section3_description: Blue Marble will display your template as the same size. If your image is 500 pixels tall and 300 pixels wide, the template will be 500 pixels tall and 300 pixels wide. Here is the instructions to display a template image on the canvas:
home_section3_step1: Find the pixel in the top left corner. Fill in Tl X, Tl Y, Px X, and Px Y with the coordinates. You can use the "Pin" icon to auto-fill the coordinates after clicking the pixel.
home_section3_image_desc_1: For creating your template we recommend using the
home_section3_image_transparent1: For <u>explicitly</u> transparent pixels, you need to use the
home_section3_step2: Upload a PNG or WEBP image.
home_section3_step4: If your template still does not show, try clicking the Enable button.
home_section4_title: If you have any problems, reach out!
home_section5_description: Since this is a userscript, there will not be many vulnerabilities. The user is in charge of their own security, by choosing which scripts to run. Regardless, if you do find a security vulnerability in Blue Marble, please report it on the GitHub Security Advisory Report a Vulnerability tab.
home_section6_title: Blue Marble is a community-driven project
home_section6_description:
We're happy to see you contribute to our project.
View more info on collaboration on our Github Docs.
privacypolicy_description: Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you visit our website.
privacypolicy_1_content:
We do not collect any personally identifiable information from you. We do not use cookies or other tracking technologies to gather your data.

The only information we may store is your language preference, which is saved in your browser's local storage. This is for the sole purpose of providing you with a consistent user experience and is not used to track you or your activity.
privacypolicy_2_content: We use Cloudflare Web Analytics to understand how our website is used. Cloudflare Web Analytics collects non-personally identifiable information such as the pages you visit, the time you spend on our site, and the referring website. This data is aggregated and does not identify you individually. This helps us improve our website's performance and content.
privacypolicy_3_content: Our website may contain links to other websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these other sites. We encourage you to read the privacy policies of any website you visit.
privacypolicy_4_content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
privacypolicy_5_content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
footer_maintainedby_project: Project maintained by SwingTheVine

install_tampermonkey_direct: Click this link to Install Blue Marble directly: Install Blue Marble. TamperMonkey will automatically detect the userscript and prompt you to install it.
install_step7: Refresh the wplace.live webpage.
install_edge_step1: Install TamperMonkey for Microsoft Edge
install_edge_step5: Download the file BlueMarble.user.js in the Assets of the latest release.
install_edge_step7: Drag the BlueMarble.user.js file inside the dashboard of TamperMonkey.
install_edge_step8: Click the Install button to install Blue Marble.
install_edge_step9: Enable Blue Marble inside the TamperMonkey dashboard.
install_refresh: Refresh the wplace.live webpage.
home_goal_description:
Blue Marble is a templating tool for wplace.live.
It shows you where to where to put pixels to create imported image.
